text: Futhi uma nesaba ukuthi angeke nikwazi ukwenza ubulungiswa ezintandaneni (zabesifazane) shadani abesifazane enibathandayoababilinomaabathathunomaabane, kephauma nesaba ukuthi angeke nenze ubulungiswa (kubona) ngakho- ke (shadani kuphela) noyedwa noma lokho okuphethwe yisandla senu sangakwesokudla lokhu (kwenzelwe) ukuthi ukuze ningachezukeli (ekungenzini ubulungiswa)
